about_the_game:
A Fight for Survival in a Pig’s Mansion!

Are you ready to live your worst nightmare? In this next-gen co-op horror game, you’ll try to escape a terrifying mansion either alone or with up to 4 friends. But beware—this mansion is home to a monstrous creature, a horrifying pig abomination!

The mansion is filled with traps and mysterious puzzles waiting to be solved. Your goal is to gather scattered items and clues throughout the house, unlock doors, and find your way to freedom. But it won’t be easy…

Survive by Getting Dirty!

The pig monster roams the mansion, constantly searching for you. To distract it, you’ll need to find spoiled food, make yourself sick, and leave strategic 💩"trails"💩. While the creature is busy consuming your mess, you’ll have the chance to execute your escape plan. But be careful: if it sees or hears you, it will mercilessly hunt you down.

Escape with Friends or Face the Nightmare Alone!

In co-op mode, you can team up with friends to work together, or you can face this nightmare solo. Will you choose teamwork, or rely on your own bravery? The choice is yours!

Experience the Pinnacle of Thrills, Strategy, and Fear!

  • Stunning next-gen graphics and an eerie atmosphere

  • Intelligent enemy AI

  • Intriguing puzzles and thrilling escape moments

  • The option to survive with friends or brave it alone

If you’re looking for a unique survival experience full of tension, this game is for you. Feel the terror as you try to escape the clutches of the pig monster. The mansion awaits… Can you make it out alive?

The horror begins.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4GB
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2070
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Survive by getting dirty! You’ve been captured by a pig-like creature. Escape this nightmare alone or with up to 4 friends in co-op mode. Leave 💩trails, distract the monster, solve puzzles, and find your way to freedom. But beware—the pig will find you, and when it does, there’s no mercy!
